name: Rand-O-mazE
description:
Rand-O-mazE is a randomly generated maze game for up to 8 players.
The game is inspired by arcade games and old console games of the 70's 80's and 90's.

The game features:
- Randomly generated levels
- 3 Difficulties, Easy 10x10, Normal 20x20 & Hard 40x40
- 5 Game types, Arcade, Rubbish, Race, Chairs & Ball
- Play using Keyboard cursor keys or a gamepad
- Many types of Game Modifiers, including wraparound,
shortcuts and more
- Extensive stats to keep track of who is better
- Up to 8 players (with gamepads)
- Windows 10 version - Steam - Late November 2018 (ish)

Stay tuned for more info.
